message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with language evolution and word sense detection using automated analysis of large amounts of digitized texts. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is also likely as the proposed method is based on network features to improve the precision of new word sense detection. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper uses SVM classifier to evaluate the proposed method. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also possible as the paper deals with the analysis of large amounts of text data. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society) is less likely but still possible as the paper discusses the impact of Big Data and expeditious exchange of information on language evolution.
